mode.Title: ▶Tutorial
mode.description: ▶ Learn the basics of Caves of Qud.

mode.Title: ▶Classic
mode.description: ▶ Permadeath: lose your character when you die.

mode.Title: ▶Wander
mode.description: ▶ {{c|∙}} Most creatures begin neutral to you. {{c|∙}} No XP for killing. {{c|∙}} More XP for discoveries and performing the water ritual. {{c|∙}} Checkpointing at settlements.

mode.Title: ▶Daily
mode.description: ▶ {{c|∙}} One chance with a fixed character and world seed. {{c|∙}} Currently in day {{W|{day_of_year}}} of {{W|{year}}}.

type.Title: ▶Presets
type.description: ▶ Pick from several preset characters. Once you get comfortable, you can customize them.

type.Title: ▶Library
type.description: ▶ Choose a character from your build library.

type.Title: ▶Last
type.description: ▶ Replay the last character you played.

pregen.Name: ▶Praetorian Prime
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Charge-based melee fighter &c∙&y Starts with night vision &c∙&y {{W|Most survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶First Gardener
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Hybrid melee and ranged fighter &c∙&y Starts with cooking and gathering &c∙&y {{W|Highly survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶First Child of the Hearth
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Melee fighter and extreme bruiser &c∙&y Starts with carbide hand bones &c∙&y {{W|Highly survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶Marsh Taur
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Charge-based melee fighter &c∙&y Ability to freeze enemies &c∙&y Highly maneuverable &c∙&y {{W|Most survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶Dream Tortoise
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Melee fighter &c∙&y Highly-armored &c∙&y Emits sleep gas to disable enemies &c∙&y {{W|Highly survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶Gunwing
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Primarily ranged fighter &c∙&y Quick and maneuverable &c∙&y Flies &c∙&y {{W|Highly survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶Star-Eye Esper
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Mental-based ranged fighter &c∙&y Effective crowd control and map vision &c∙&y {{W|Medium survivable}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶Firefrond
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Hybrid melee fighter and mental caster &c∙&y Ability to set enemies on fire &c∙&y Causes harvestable plants to grow nearby &c∙&y {{W|Challenging}} starting build

pregen.Name: ▶bzzzt
pregen.description: ▶ &c∙&y Hybrid melee fighter and electrical attacker &c∙&y Burrower and trap-setter &c∙&y Starts with night vision &c∙&y {{W|Challenging}} starting build

location.Name: ▶{{G|salt marsh}} village
location.description: ▶ {{c|∙}} Random village in the salt marshes. {{c|∙}} Village teaches Harvestry. {{c|∙}} +50 reputation with insects and fish. {{c|∙}} Start with a pair of {{g|crocc{{G|a}}sins}}.

location.Name: ▶{{Y|salt dunes}} village
location.description: ▶ {{c|∙}} Random village in the salt dunes. {{c|∙}} Village teaches Fasting Way. {{c|∙}} +100 reputation with reptiles. {{c|∙}} Start with an {{Y|Issach{{r|a}}ri}} banner.

location.Name: ▶{{W|desert canyon}} village
location.description: ▶ {{c|∙}} Random village in the desert canyons. {{c|∙}} Village teaches Wayfaring. {{c|∙}} +50 reputation with equines, tortoises, and vines.

location.Name: ▶{{Y|hill}} village
location.description: ▶ {{c|∙}} Random village in the hills. {{c|∙}} Village teaches Butchering. {{c|∙}} +100 reputation with hermits. {{c|∙}} Start with a {{r|blood-stained}} neck-ring

location.Name: ▶a sunken caravanserai
location.description: ▶ You arrive at the outskirts of Qud.
